name: player career year different season types
description: Test case for career year column with different season types (REG, POST, PRE)
expected_query: select "player"."pid", player.fname, player.lname, ta2cf3dc4e23d06ead63670237080650b.career_year as career_year_0, "player"."pos" from "player" inner join "player_seasonlogs" as "t400d8fd8d99658efbdbc325edea87166" on "t400d8fd8d99658efbdbc325edea87166"."pid" = "player"."pid" and t400d8fd8d99658efbdbc325edea87166.seas_type = 'REG' and t400d8fd8d99658efbdbc325edea87166.year = ${constants.current_season.year} left join "player_seasonlogs" as "ta2cf3dc4e23d06ead63670237080650b" on "ta2cf3dc4e23d06ead63670237080650b"."pid" = "player"."pid" and ta2cf3dc4e23d06ead63670237080650b.seas_type = 'POST' and ta2cf3dc4e23d06ead63670237080650b.year = 2023 where t400d8fd8d99658efbdbc325edea87166.career_year >= '1' group by player.fname, player.lname, ta2cf3dc4e23d06ead63670237080650b.career_year, "player"."pid", "player"."lname", "player"."fname", "player"."pos" order by 4 ASC NULLS LAST, "player"."pid" asc limit 10
